nodes.text: The Bontraar residence was the home of the Bothan businessman Elwis Bontraar on the planet of Coruscant. When Elwis's daughter Jennalyn was kidnapped by the Cerean Zascha as revenge for her sister's death, the kidnapper sent a ransom letter to the Bontraar residence demanding 1,000 cred sticks for their daughter's safe return.
